name: Junior Supply Chain Specialist
description:
An excellent opportunity for logistics specialists with dry bulk/container background to join the dynamic oil and gas industry.

An international trading company seeks to recruit a Jr. Supply Chain Specialist for its Moscow office. The position involves managing all aspects of crude and petroleum product shipments and providing support to traders as required.

This is a full-time position in a stimulating, progressive and inspiring environment for the right candidate with substantial upside career potential and an excellent remuneration package. Training for those joining with dry bulk/container track record will be provided.

Required skills, qualifications and experience:

  • A Bachelor’s degree in the following Shipping/Marine Engineering/Petroleum or Chemical Engineering/Commerce/Logistics is preferable but not critical with the right experience. A Master’s degree is a plus
  • Continuous track record with a shipping line, a forwarding, or a trading company in a supply chain management role
  • A good communicator with excellent business English and Russian
  • Meticulousness, diligence, an eye for detail is essential.

Responsibilities:

  • Delivering all aspects of a trading deal, including but not limited to:
    • Shipping and delivery arrangements, including document issuance
    • Q&Q control
    • Invoicing, data capture and record keeping
    • Demurrage issues
    • Dispute management
  • Relationship management with surveyors and forwarders
  • Supporting the trading team as required

The member of the team is expected to be proactive, to provide constructive input in streamlining and optimising supply chains, to monitor the markets and trade flows for generation of better supply chain management solutions.
